head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STECHER, BEATRICE (NEE SEELAV, BENEDICT)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STECHER, BEATRICE (NEE SEELAV, BENEDICT)

block.p: STECHER--Beatrice (nee Seelav, Benedict). In Fort Myers, Florida, on April 12, 2007, after a brief illness. Survived by her daughter, Jo Anne Stecher, son-in-law Terrence Pardoe, and sister-inlaw, Jeanne Seelav. She served in the US Army for eight years during and after WWII at the Pentagon, in Frankfurt, Germany and Mitchell Field, ending her career as a Major. Contributions would be appreciated to Jewish National Fund or City of Hope Medical Center in Duarte, CA.

STECHER--Beatrice (nee Seelav, Benedict). In Fort Myers, Florida, on April 12, 2007, after a brief illness. Survived by her daughter, Jo Anne Stecher, son-in-law Terrence Pardoe, and sister-inlaw, Jeanne Seelav. She served in the US Army for eight years during and after WWII at the Pentagon, in Frankfurt, Germany and Mitchell Field, ending her career as a Major. Contributions would be appreciated to Jewish National Fund or City of Hope Medical Center in Duarte, CA.
